text: The 1989–90 UTEP Miners men's basketball team represented the University of Texas at El Paso in the 1989–90 college basketball season. The team was led by legendary head coach Don Haskins. The Miners finished 21–11 (10–6 in WAC), won the WAC Tournament championship, and gained an automatic bid to the NCAA Tournament. ==Roster== ==Schedule and results== |- !colspan=9 style=| Regular Season |- !colspan=9 style=| WAC Tournament |- !colspan=9 style=| NCAA Tournament ==Rankings== ==NBA Draft== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" style="" | Round || Pick || Player || NBA Club |- style="text-align:center;" bgcolor="" | 2 || 35 || Greg Foster || Washington Bullets |- style="text- align:center;" bgcolor="" | 2 || 45 || Antonio Davis || Indiana Pacers |} ==References== Category:UTEP Miners men's basketball seasons Utep Utep
